SEARCH
Package grafiosch.rest

Class DailyLimitUpdCreateLogger<T extends BaseID<Integer>>

java.lang.Object
grafiosch.rest.DailyLimitUpdCreateLogger<T>
Type Parameters:
T - The type of the entity being managed, which must extend BaseID.
Direct Known Subclasses:
UpdateCreate
public abstract class DailyLimitUpdCreateLogger<T extends BaseID<Integer>> extends Object
Abstract class providing logging and daily limit checks for create, update, and delete (CUD) operations on entities. It is intended to be extended by REST controllers that manage entities requiring such controls.

This class maintains a count of CUD operations performed by a user on a specific entity type per day. It checks these counts against predefined limits stored in UserEntityChangeLimit. If a limit is exceeded, a LimitEntityTransactionException is thrown.

Logging of CUD operations is also handled, typically recording the user, entity type, and operation type.

  • Method Details

    • logAddUpdDel

      protected void logAddUpdDel(Integer idUser, Class<T> zclass, OperationType operationType)
      Logs an add, update, or delete operation performed by a user on an entity class. This version is used when the entity instance might not be available (e.g., after deletion).
      Parameters:
      idUser - The ID of the user performing the operation.
      zclass - The class of the entity that was affected.
      operationType - The type of operation (ADD, UPDATE, DELETE).

    • logAddUpdDel

      protected void logAddUpdDel(Integer idUser, T entity, OperationType operationType)
      Logs an add, update, or delete operation performed by a user on an entity.
      Parameters:
      idUser - The ID of the user performing the operation.
      entity - The entity that was affected by the operation.
      operationType - The type of operation (ADD, UPDATE, DELETE).

    • logAddUpdDel

      protected void logAddUpdDel(Integer idUser, String entityName, OperationType operationType)
      This increases the counter for the corresponding operation by one.
      Parameters:
      idUser - The user performing the operation. Their ID is used to track daily limits.
      entityName - The entity instance involved in the CUD operation.
      operationType - The type of operation (ADD, UPDATE, DELETE).

    • checkDailyLimitOnCRUDOperations

      protected void checkDailyLimitOnCRUDOperations(T entity, User user)
      Checks if the current CUD operation for the given entity by the specified user exceeds the daily limit. If the limit is reached or exceeded, a LimitEntityTransactionException is thrown. Otherwise, the count for the operation is incremented.
      Parameters:
      entity - The entity instance involved in the CUD operation. Its class name is used to identify the entity type for limit checking.
      user - The user performing the operation. Their ID is used to track daily limits.
      Throws:
      LimitEntityTransactionException - If the daily CUD limit for this entity type and user is exceeded.
